objects.text:
• 2 Adorable Kitty Figures
• Spinning Palm Tree
• Relaxing Hammock
• Play Food & Accessories

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
The banner features a vibrant and playful design divided into four colored quadrants with soft pastel tones. The top-left and bottom-left sections have pink backgrounds, while the bottom-right is mint green. The layout includes a large product image ("product_image") placed on the right half. Bold and dynamic main heading layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") sit at the top-left, rendered in a fun, bright magenta font. A subheading ("subheading") in deep violet is placed beneath the main title. Core product features are listed in the "description" text element. The price ("price") is prominently displayed above a vivid CTA button ("cta_button") with "cta" as its white center text.

**Color Palette:**
- Bright Magenta (#FF1493)
- Soft Pink (#FFD1E8, #FFE1F0)
- Mint Green (#A7F9E5)
- Deep Violet (#8A2BE2)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a playful and vibrant color palette ideal for children's advertising. Dominant colors include hot pink (#EF4CA9) in the cat house, soft peach (#F2C59F) in the structure, bright teal (#3DD6C3) and green (#26A65B) in the grass and leaves, and vibrant purple (#A66DD1) noticeable in toys and accents. These colors blend harmoniously with youthful contrast—greens evoke nature, while pinks and purples add whimsy. Accent objects like the cats and accessories introduce soft neutrals and bold secondary tones like red (#E63946) and sky blue (#5AC9E9). This eye-catching, cohesive palette communicates fun, comfort, and imaginative play.
